mapper.update: update department set basic_salary=#{basicSalary} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from attendance where employee_id=#{id} and DATE_FORMAT(office_time,'%Y%m')=DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
select e.id as employeeId from department d,employee e where d.id=e.department_id and d.id=#{id}
select basic_salary as basicSalary from department where id=#{id}
select money from rewards where employee_id=#{id}
select count(*) as days from overtime where id=#{id} and DATE_FORMAT(startTime,"%Y%m")=DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,"%Y%m") and (approve!=""||approve!=null)
select count(*) from wage w,employee e where DATE_FORMAT(pay_date,"%Y%m")=DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,"%Y%m") and w.employee_id=e.id and w.employee_id=#{id}
select e.name,e.position,w.* from wage w,employee e where e.id=w.employee_id and DATE_FORMAT(w.pay_date,"%Y%m")=DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_DATE,"%Y%m")-1 ORDER BY e.department_id
